name: Zilla v Mothmom
description:
Made for Kaijujam2.

-----------------------------------------

Delay Zilla across six levels to prevent him from reaching the nest of Mothmom. Inspired by Mothra vs. Godzilla.

Controls:

Z - navigate menus

Mouse -- Summon and interact with units.

---------------------------------------------------

A few hours before the deadline, I accidently deleted all my game assets. Recreated lamer versions of sprites and maps. No audio. Not as polished as I would have liked. Oh well. Enjoy!
